articles.title: DPRK Delegate's Speech at UN Disarmament Commission Meeting
articles.content:
DPRK Delegate's Speech at UN Disarmament Commission Meeting
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- A DPRK delegate made a speech at the 2017 Meeting of the United Nations Disarmament Commission on April 3.
					 Noting that instability and danger of nuclear war are ever-increasing worldwide due to the reckless nuclear force buildup of the U.S. and nuclear weapons states are scaling up their nuclear strategic forces both in quantity and quality to cope with it, the delegate pointed out that any progress in the field of nuclear disarmament can never be expected unless anachronistic hegemonic scenario to steadily dominate the world by dint of strategic nuclear edge is terminated.
					
					 The overall and complete nuclear disarmament and the removal of constant threat to global peace and security are possible only when the U.S. nuclear threat and military actions aimed at bringing down the independent countries by force are stopped, the delegate said, and went on:
					
					 Now the Korean peninsula has turned into the worst hot spot in the world, being exposed to the danger of a nuclear war.
					
					 The U.S., whenever it staged nuclear war drills in south Korea, termed the drills "annual" and "defensive" ones to cope with the DPRK's access to nukes. This is no more than an artifice to shift the blame for the tense situation on the peninsula onto the DPRK and justify their wild ambition for aggression.
					
					 The U.S. is the arch criminal harassing peace and stability on the peninsula and in other parts of Northeast Asia only to escalate tensions as it is hell-bent on risky war rehearsals in south Korea which is little short of a nuclear arsenal.
					
					 It is an entirely just right to self-defence of a sovereign state to keep itself highly alert and bolster in every way its strong war deterrent capable of mercilessly wiping out the aggressors as required by the grim situation where an actual war may break out any moment.
					
					 It is thanks to the resolute will and efforts of the DPRK for peace and its tremendous nuclear deterrent for self-defence that peace has been preserved on the Korean peninsula despite the U.S. imperialists' foolhardy moves for a nuclear war.
					
					 As long as the U.S. and its vassal forces persistently pose nuclear threat and blackmail and continue the nuclear war racket masked as an annual one at the doorstep of the DPRK, the DPRK will as ever bolster up its capabilities for self-defence and preemptive attack with the nuclear force as a pivot.
					
					 Urging the Disarmament Commission to pay special attention to the acts of infringing upon sovereignty of other countries and bringing down their social systems being manifested in such forms as undisguised nuclear threat, war drills and sanctions and blockade, the delegate clarified the stand of the DPRK to support the activities of the non-aligned movement for overall and complete nuclear disarmament and make efforts to carry it out.

articles.title: Press Release of North Preparatory Committee for Pan-national Conference
articles.content:
Press Release of North Preparatory Committee for Pan-national Conference
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- The North-side Preparatory Committee for the Pan-national Conference for Peace and Reunification of the Country and Development of North-South Relations Friday released the following press release:
					 Now Koreans in south Korea and abroad are becoming increasingly vocal opposing and rejecting the U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime's war moves against the DPRK. Against this backdrop, activities are getting brisk among Koreans to realize the pan-national conference.
					
					 The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification formed its preparatory committee for successful holding of the pan-national conference for peace and reunification of the country and development of the north-south relations on March 25 and vowed to take the lead in making the conference a success.
					
					 Amid the high-pitched public struggle against the joint military drills of the U.S. and south Korean warmongers and for peace of the Korean peninsula and improved north-south relations going on in Seoul, Pusan and all other parts of south Korea, the work to form regional preparatory committees for the pan-national conference is gaining in scope and strength in various parts of south Korea including South Kyongsang and Kyongsang provinces and Kwangju City.
					
					 The Confederation of Trade Unions and the Federation of Trade Unions of south Korea are also making dynamic efforts to form a preparatory committee of workers organizations in the north and the south for realizing the pan-national conference for reunification.
					
					 Compatriots' bodies and personages in different regions of the world, including Japan, China and the U.S., joined in the dynamic campaign for opposing the north-targeted military drills of the U.S. and realizing the pan-national conference for reunification.
					
					 A meeting of the joint working committee of Koreans in the north and the south and abroad for the pan-national conference will be held in Shenyang of China in mid-April amid the ever-growing enthusiasm and will of all Koreans for peace and independent reunification of the country at home and abroad.

articles.title: Throwing overboard Park and Conservative Group of S. Korea Urged
articles.content:
Throwing overboard Park and Conservative Group of S. Korea Urged
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- A spokesman of the DPRK Measure Council for Human Rights in South Korea released a statement Friday in connection with the mounting struggle of the south Korean people of all social standings demanding a probe into the truth behind the hideous ferry Sewol tragedy and the punishment of its chief culprits on the occasion of the salvage of the ferry.
					 The statement said that the struggle is an eruption of the pent-up curse and indignation at Park Geun Hye and the group of conservatives who go impudent without making apology and repentance of the hideous disaster they caused through unprecedented unpopular rule.
					
					 Those inside the sinking ship met deaths en masse, a tragic murder entirely attributable to the Park Geun Hye group, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Cold-blooded Park and the group of conservatives caused the ferry disaster and made whole south Korea a sinking ship. This hideous crime can never be covered up.
					
					 Park was ousted from Chongwadae and thrown into prison, being punished by history and the people. But she is grinding her teeth of revenge, while prolonging her despicable remaining days. And the group of conservatives, her accomplices, are deceiving and mocking at the public through all sorts of tricks and impudence in a bid to bring about the second Park Geun Hye regime.
					
					 The ousting and detention of Park are just the first step toward the new life and new society in south Korea.
					
					 The south Koreans from all walks of life have to make thorough-going probe into the truth behind the ferry Sewol disaster and severely punish those responsible to achieve the genuine life and dignity of the people and thus have the towering grudge of hundreds of schoolchildren, who had been buried at sea alive, settled and throw overboard without fail the group of traitors together with Park Geun Hye.

articles.title: KCNA Report on Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Assumption of Top Posts of Party and State
articles.content:
KCNA Report on Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Assumption of Top Posts of Party and State
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- The Korean Central News Agency released a report Friday on the occasion of the fifth anniversary of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's assumption of the top posts of the Workers' Party of Korea and the state.
					 The report said:
					
					 The Fourth Conference of the WPK and the 5th Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly in April Juche 101 (2012) decided to have Kim Jong Un at the helm of the Korean revolution, reflecting the unanimous will of the entire party and army and all the people. This was a great political event and great national jubilee that brought an epochal turn in the drive to strengthen the party and build a powerful socialist country at the important historic juncture of accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Our party, army and people have pushed ahead with the victorious advance of the socialist cause and performed the greatest miracles under the uplifted banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, holding fast to the behests of leader Kim Jong Il as the lifeline under the seasoned and tested leadership of Kim Jong Un, who is possessed of brilliant ideo-theoretical wisdom, rare leadership ability and distinguished popular traits, and along the road of sure victories indicated by him.
					
					 Guided by Kim Jong Un, our party has developed into the party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and all the servicepersons and civilians are united closer around it in thought, purpose and loyalty and Juche Korea has made so rapid progress that it emerged a nuclear and military power in the East protecting global peace.
					
					 Despite the worst situation where other countries would have collapsed a hundred times owing to the imperialists' unprecedented moves to stifle and isolate, socialist Korea is demonstrating such tremendous national strength that it is  steadily conquering the vast space in the spirit of self-reliance and self-development and greeting a new golden age of  national prosperity, the great Mallima era in which the people's dream and ideal are becoming stirring realities by doing ten or twenty years' work in just one year. 
					
					 The astonishing realities brought by the glorious Kim Jong Un's era go to clearly prove the immutable truth that no one can block the victorious advance of socialist Korea following the road indicated by the great party and a final victory is in store for us.
					
					 Only victory and glory are in store for the army and people of the DPRK dashing ahead in the revolutionary spirit of Paektu and the might of self-reliance and self-development, holding aloft the banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Italian Diplomat Meets Officials Concerned of DPRK
articles.content:
Italian Diplomat Meets Officials Concerned of DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- The first secretary of the Italian embassy here met officials concerned of the Foreign Ministry, the Ministry of Agriculture and the Institute of Agricultural Science of the DPRK on April 5 and 6, exchanged views on the current situation of the Korean peninsula and discussed matters of bilateral relations including cooperation in the field of agriculture.
					 The DPRK side talked about the measures for self-defence taken by the DPRK to cope with the U.S. moves of holding the largest-ever joint military exercises with the south Korean puppet forces for the purpose of carrying out "beheading operation" and "operation for occupying Pyongyang" after introducing huge nuclear strategic assets which push the situation on the peninsula to the extremes.
					
					 The Italian diplomat expressed deep concern about the situation on the Korean peninsula inching close to a war and hoped that all the issues would be settled through dialogues and negotiations.

articles.title: Iranian Ambassador Gives Reception
articles.content:
Iranian Ambassador Gives Reception
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- Iranian Ambassador to the DPRK Seyed Mohsen Emadi Friday gave a reception at the embassy on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there on invitation were Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the Supreme People's Assembly, Thae Hyong Chol, president of Kim Il Sung University and concurrently minister of Higher Education who is chairman of the DPRK-Iran Friendship Parliamentary Group, Jong Yong Su, minister of Labor and chairman of the DPRK-Iran Friendship Association, Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, and officials concerned.
					
					 Iranian embassy officials were on hand.
					
					 The ambassador said in his speech that President Kim Il Sung is the great leader who founded the DPRK and fathered the Juche idea, an original revolutionary philosophy.
					
					 He referred to the feats of the President who frustrated the threat and blackmail of the hostile forces and their moves to stifle the DPRK and achieved progress and prosperity by leading the Korean revolutionary armed forces to victory.
					
					 He wished the Korean people greater success in their struggle to develop the country under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, true to the behests of the President.
					
					 Choe Thae Bok said that the whole life of the President is a sacred history of the peerlessly great man that shines with loving care for the country, the people and the nation.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK have put spurs to the all-people general offensive to realize the patriotic desire of the great leaders for building a powerful country under the grand blueprint unrolled by Kim Jong Un, regarding it as their supreme duty and moral obligation to live and struggle as befitting the descendants of the President, he noted.
					
					 He stressed that everlasting will be the feats the President performed for the development of the friendly relations between the DPRK and Iran and for global independence.

articles.title: WHO Representative Gives Reception
articles.content:
WHO Representative Gives Reception
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- Thushara Fernando, representative of the World Health Organization to the DPRK, gave a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club Friday to mark World Health Day.
					 Present there were Kim Hyong Hun, vice-minister of Public Health, officials concerned and representatives of foreign embassies and missions of international organizations here.
					
					 On hand were members of the WHO mission.

articles.title: Diplomatic Envoys of EU Member States Tour Wonsan Shoes Factory, Wonsan Army-People Power Station
articles.content:
Diplomatic Envoys of EU Member States Tour Wonsan Shoes Factory, Wonsan Army-People Power Station
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- Diplomatic envoys of EU member states to the DPRK toured the Wonsan Shoes Factory and the Wonsan Army-People Power Station on Wednesday and Thursday.
					 Being briefed on the leadership feats of the peerlessly great men of Mt Paektu for the factory and the power station and the spirit of self-reliance and self-development and the indomitable working style displayed by the people in Kwangwon Province, they went round with keen interest various production processes put on a high automated and modern basis.
					
					 They also visited the Sokwang Temple, a famous cultural site of Korea, in Kosan County, Kangwon Province.

articles.title: Marathoners Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Marathoners Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 28th Mangyongdae Prize International Marathon Friday visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill.
					 They laid a floral basket at the statues and paid tribute to the great leaders.

articles.title: Remodeled Paeksong Revolutionary Museum Opens
articles.content:
Remodeled Paeksong Revolutionary Museum Opens
 Phyongsong, April 7 (KCNA) -- The Paeksong Revolutionary Museum was successfully remodeled on the occasions of the 65th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's visit to Kim Il Sung University located at Paeksong-ri during the Fatherland Liberation War and the Day of the Sun, his birth anniversary.
					 Visiting Paeksong-ri in April Juche 41 (1952), he indicated the orientation of the work for training national cadres in wartime and unfolded the projects for post-war reconstruction of the national economy, socialist construction and grand nature-remaking.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il visited this place in April 1966 and on other several occasions to initiate buidling a revolutionary site there and settle all problems arising in its construction and thus made sure that leadership exploits left by the President in Paeksong-ri are glorified generation after generation.
					
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, who regarded the work of preserving revolutionary relics as a very important matter, indicated the orientation and ways to better the Paeksong Revolutionary Museum.
					
					 Photos and art works showing the peerlessly great men and supplemented data on the struggle of students of Kim Il Sung University during the Fatherland Liberation War have been newly displayed.
					
					 An opening ceremony took place on Friday.
					
					 It was attended by officials concerned and employees of the museum and Phyongsongites.

articles.title: Agricultural Workers Meet
articles.content:
Agricultural Workers Meet
 Sariwon, April 7 (KCNA) -- Agricultural workers and members of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK) met at the Migok Cooperative Farm in Sariwon City, North Hwanghae Province Friday to celebrate the 24th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 Kim Chang Yop, chairman of the UAWK Central Committee, made a report at the meeting to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said that Kim Jong Il's history of nation-building is shining with his undying feats as he explored a new way of building a socialist state in the era of Songun, guided by his original Songun revolutionary idea, and established the state machinery with the national defence as a pivot, thus turning the DPRK into a great power of independence.
					
					 Kim Jong Il unrolled a new history of agricultural revolution on this land with his tireless energetic leadership, they said, adding:
					
					 He saw to it that the UAWK defended and added luster to President Kim Il Sung's ideas and exploits for the socialist rural construction and creditably fulfilled its mission as an organization for ideological education.
					
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un is creditably carrying forward and developing Kim Jong Il's idea and cause of nation-building.
					
					 They underscored the need to make positive contributions to improving the standard of people's living and bringing earlier the victory of building an economic power by winning a signal victory on the agricultural front this year of weighty importance in implementing the five-year strategy for national economic development under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: National Martial Art Championship for Mangyongdae Prize Closes
articles.content:
National Martial Art Championship for Mangyongdae Prize Closes
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- There closed the National Martial Art Championship for Mangyongdae Prize which was opened in celebration of the Day of the Sun.
					 Pyongyang City Taekwon-do Team came first in team standing in the championship.
					
					 Jagang Provincial Taekwon-do Sports Team took the first place in Taekwon-do event.
					
					 In group sparring matches, male players of South Hamgyong Provincial Taekwon-do Sports Team and female players of Pyongyang City Taekwon-do Sports Team placed first.
					
					 Pyongyang City Taekwon-do Sports Team won in the Paduk event.
					
					 Recipients of technical prizes in Taekwon-do event were Ri Il Ryong (man) from North Hamgyong Provincial Taekwon-do Sports Team, Kim Hyang Sim (female) from North Phyongan Provincial Taekwon-do Sports Team. Ri Kyong Guk (male) of Pyongyang City Taekwon-do Sports Team and Ham Un Gyong (female) of the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee were awarded individual technical prizes of Paduk.
					
					 A closing ceremony was held at the Basketball Gymnasium in Chongchun Street on April 7.
					
					 Present there were Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the WPK Central Committee, officials concerned and players, coaches and citizens.

articles.title: 22nd Cooking Festival Held in DPRK
articles.content:
22nd Cooking Festival Held in DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- The 22nd Cooking Festival took place at the Pyongyang Noodle House on April 4-7.
					 Presented to it were more than 1,600 dishes and drinks made by those in the public service field across the country and over 70 scientific and technical achievements.
					
					 The festival was attended by at least 80 units of ministries and national institutions, Pyongyang and all provinces.
					
					 It was divided into the exhibition of famous dishes and local specialties, exhibition of compulsory dishes, exhibition of loach dishes, exhibition of scientific and technical achievements in cooking and the contest of practical skills and demonstration of cooks and waiters and waitresses and cooking skills of students whose major is culinary art.

articles.title: Group B Matches of AFC Women's Asian Cup Jordan 2018 Qualifiers (3)
articles.content:
Group B Matches of AFC Women's Asian Cup Jordan 2018 Qualifiers (3)
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- Following are the results from Group B matches of AFC Women's Asian Cup Jordan 2018 Qualifiers held at Kim Il Sung Stadium in Pyongyang on Friday.
					 DPRK : South Korea 1:1
					
					 Uzbekistan : India 7:1

articles.title: Premier Soccer League Begins in DPRK
articles.content:
Premier Soccer League Begins in DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- Men's premier soccer league for Mangyongdae Prize Sports Games started in Pyongyang to celebrate the Day of the Sun, birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (April 15).
					 According to an official concerned of the DPRK Football Association, the matches are scheduled to be held only on Saturdays and Sundays, according to a new timetable.
					
					 Following are the results of league matches held on April 1 and 2.
					
					 April 25 : Ryongnamsan 5:0
					
					 Sobaeksu : Jebi 3:0
					
					 February 8 : Myohyangsan 3:0
					
					 Wolmido : Ministry of Light Industry 2:2
					
					 Pothonggang : Hwaebul  3:0
					
					 Pyongyang : Kalmaegi  3:1
					
					 Amnokgang : Rimyongsu  2:0
					
					 After the group league matches, matches based on team standings between groups A and C and between groups B and D are slated for April 22 and 23. Final stage games for 1st-8th place will be held on April 30 and placement matches for 9th-16th on April 29.
					
					 Meanwhile, women's premier soccer league for the Mangyongdae Prize Sports Games, which started on April 3, will come to a close on April 25.

articles.title: International Friendship Botanical House
articles.content:
International Friendship Botanical House
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- With the approach of the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (April 15), flowers are in full bloom at the International Friendship Botanical House of the Central Botanical Garden in Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK.
					 Now, it is crowded with citizens, school youth and children, foreigners and overseas Koreans.
					
					 In this regard, Kim Myong Ho, a section chief of the garden, told KCNA that many foreigners have visited the botanical house and highly praised it as a showplace of rare plants for revering peerlessly great men and the eternal treasure of humankind, adding:
					
					 The botanical house has five gift-plant greenhouses like Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia greenhouses and covers an area of over 4,000 square meters.
					
					 Among gift plants in the greenhouses are more than 1,400 gift plants of over 450 species presented to President Kim Il Sung by heads of state, prominent politicians, organizations for the study of the Juche idea, progressive figures and overseas Koreans of different countries. And they are closely associated with the boundless reverence for the President.
					
					 The modern greenhouses plays a role of preserving and culturing in a scientific way various species of flowers, flowering plants and fruit trees, including progenitor of Kimilsungia, and propagating them in all parts of the country.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korean Regime of Bringing North-South Ties to Collapse
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korean Regime of Bringing North-South Ties to Collapse
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- It is an unshakable will of the DPRK to foil the challenge of the anti-reunification forces, improve the north-south relations and pave a broad avenue to independent reunification under the uplifted banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, as required by the trend of times and as desired by all Koreans, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article.
					 Underlining the need to put a definite end to the confrontational policy of the south Korean conservative regime against reunification, the root cause of the collapse of the north-south ties, the article goes on:
					
					 The south Korean puppet authorities are now working hard to preserve traitor Park Geun Hye's confrontation policy, being dead-set against the public demand for the repaired north-south relations. They mislead the public opinion by insisting that the north-south ties collapsed due to the steps taken by the DPRK for bolstering its nuclear deterrent for self-defence.
					
					 This is just a brazen-faced assertion to shift the blame for the north-south deadlock onto the DPRK, persistently maintain their confrontation policy against reunification and realize their wild ambition for stifling the compatriots in the north at any cost.
					
					 As for the above-said steps, they are the best option to defend the sovereignty and peace of the country and the security of the nation from the foolhardy moves of the U.S. to start a nuclear war. It also serves as a guarantee for stability on the Korean peninsula and in other parts of the region.
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear deterrent for self-defence is, indeed, a treasure common to the nation which helps independently carve out its destiny and pave an avenue to peace and prosperity.
					
					 With no rhetoric can the puppet authorities play down the justice of the DPRK's nuclear deterrent firmly preserving peace on the Korean peninsula and security of the nation and hide their true colors as wreckers of the north-south relations.

articles.title: S. Korea Plagued by Evasion of Military Service
articles.content:
S. Korea Plagued by Evasion of Military Service
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- The number of youths evading military service under various pretexts is on the steady increase in south Korea, according to Yonhap News on April 2.
					 The south Korean puppet regime reportedly introduced the system of special judicial police officer in April 2012 to prevent the rampant evasion of military service among youths, but the number of such acts is still increasing from 2013, according to data submitted by the Military Service Agency to the "National Assembly."

articles.title: Koreans in China Vow to Struggle for Independent National Reunification
articles.content:
Koreans in China Vow to Struggle for Independent National Reunification
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China, in a statement on Mar. 31, recalled that the Japanese Regional Committee of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration sent all the overseas Koreans an appeal to make tangible contributions to averting military conflict and the danger of nuclear war on the homeland and ensure the peace and improve the inter-Korean ties and hold a pan-national conference without fail and usher in the heyday for nation-wide reunification movement.
					 The general association and all Koreans in China fully support the appeal, it noted.
					
					 The statement expressed the will to extend firm support and solidarity to the activities of political parties and social organizations and broad masses of people in south Korea aspiring after independence and democracy and make positive contribution to achieving the great national unity and independent reunification together with the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad.

articles.title: Koreans in China Hail S. Korean People's Struggle for New Society
articles.content:
Koreans in China Hail S. Korean People's Struggle for New Society
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- The Federation of Korean Economic Workers in China, in a statement on April 1, noted that the new politics, new social system and new society so much desired by the south Koreans would not come simply because traitor Park Guen Hye is ousted from Chongwadae.
					 The prevailing situation requires them to throw overboard all the pro-U.S. conservative forces and win greater victory through candlelight actions of justice and truth, the statement said, adding:
					
					 All members of the federation are firmly convinced that south Korean people from all walks of life would burn the desperate pro-U.S. conservative group through torchlight actions of justice and carry on dynamic struggle to build a new society desirous of reunification, free from foreign forces, dictatorship and scandals.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Finland
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Finland
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, was formed in Helsinki, Finland on April 3.
					 Pekka Kotkasaari, chairman of the Finland-Korea Society, was elected chairmen of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events including meeting, photo and book exhibition and film show in celebration of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Meeting of Nepalese Preparatory Committee for Day of Sun
articles.content:
Meeting of Nepalese Preparatory Committee for Day of Sun
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- There took place a meeting of the Nepalese national preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, on Mar. 24.
					 Attending it were personages from the C.C., Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist), the Nepal Journalist Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Politics, the Study and Research Forum of Songun Politics of the National Press Club of Nepal, the Study Forum for Self-Reliance of Nepal, the Nepali Literary Forum for the Study of Songun Politics and other organizations.
					
					 The meeting discussed the matters for significantly celebrating the Day of the Sun and intensifying the solidarity movement for support to the Korean army and people in their vigorous efforts to defend socialism from the imperialists' anti-DPRK moves, and adopted a declaration.
					
					 The declaration said:
					
					 It is great honor of the Nepalese people to splendidly celebrate the 105th birth anniversary of the great President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 We will deeply study Kim Il Sung's revolutionary idea, organize such political and cultural events as seminar on his exploits and give wide publicity to his greatness in the run-up to his birth anniversary.
					
					 His idea and exploits are so great that they will shine forever along with history.
					
					 We call upon the world progressives to significantly celebrate the birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung who made immortal contributions to the human cause of independence.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised by Indonesian Figure
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised by Indonesian Figure
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- Ristiyanto, general secretary of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia, made public a statement on Mar. 30 to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Recalling the revolutionary career and immortal feats of Kim Il Sung, the statement said:
					
					 He is the father of socialist Korea as he freed the Korean people from the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule, founded the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and turned it into a country independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					 He is the benevolent father of the Korean people as he dedicated his all life to the people's happiness.
					
					 He made distinguished contributions to the development of the Indonesia-DPRK friendly relations and the global peace and security.
					
					 His exploits for the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence will be kept deep in the mind of the Korean people and the world progressives.

articles.title: Representante coreano pronuncia discurso en la reunion de Comision de Desarme
articles.content:
Representante coreano pronuncia discurso en la reunion de Comision de Desarme
Pyongyang, 7 de abril (ACNC) -- El representante de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea pronuncio el dia 3 un discurso en la reunion de la Comision del Desarme de la ONU de 2017.
					El se refirio a que hoy dia, se agravan la inestabilidad de toda la Tierra y el peligro de guerra nuclear de imprevisible consecuencia debido a las imprudentes maniobras de EE.UU. destinadas a aumentar y modernizar las fuerzas armadas nucleares. Para hacer frente a ello, otros paises poseedores de armas nucleares siguen mejorando en lo cuantitativo y cualitativo las fuerzas armadas nucleares estrategicas.
					
					Mientras que no se ponga punto final al anacronico hegemonismo destinado a dominar la Tierra mediante la superioridad nuclear estrategica, no se puede esperar ningun avance en el sector de desarme nuclear, dijo y continuo:.
					
					El desarme nuclear general y completo y la eliminacion de la amenaza permanente a la paz y seguridad mundiales son posibles solo cuando se detengan la amenaza nuclear y las acciones militares de Estados Unidos orientadas a derrumbar por la fuerza a los Estados soberanos e independientes.
					
					En la actualidad, la Peninsula Coreana deviene la zona mas candente del mundo que entrana hasta el peligro de estallido de guerra nuclear.
					
					Cada vez que EE.UU. libra en el Sur de Corea los ejercicios militares de guerra nuclear, los justifica como "anuales" y "defensivos" para hacer frente a la posesion de armas nucleares por la RPDC. Esto no pasa de ser una artimana tendente a dar razon a su ambicion de agresion al imputar a la RPDC la responsabilidad de exacerbacion de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					EE.UU., que se aferra a las peligrosisimas maniobras belicas en el Sur de Corea, arsenal nuclear, es el culpable del empeoramiento de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y el Nordeste Asiatico y de la perturbacion de la paz y estabilidad de la misma region.
					
					Es el derecho justo y autodefensivo de un Estado soberano mantener la disposicion de movilizacion de acuerdo con la demanda de la situacion severa en que nadie sabe cuando se desatara la guerra real y consolidar por todos los medios el fuerte disuasivo de guerra capaz de aniquilar despiadadamente a los agresores.
					
					Pese a las acciones provocadoras de guerra nuclear de EE.UU., la Peninsula Coreana pudo mantener la paz gracias a la firme voluntad y esfuerzos constantes de la RPDC por defender la paz y su formidable disuasivo nuclear para la autodefensa.
					
					Mientras EE.UU. y sus seguidores no dejen de ejercer la amenaza y chantaje nucleares sobre la RPDC ni de desarrollar los ejercicios de guerra nuclear con la excusa de que es una tradicion efectuarlos ano tras ano, la RPDC seguira fortaleciendo la capacidad de autodefensa nacional y de ataque preventivo centrada en las fuerzas armadas nucleares.
					
					La Comision del Desarme debe prestar otra vez la atencion especial a los actos de violacion de soberania y derrocamiento de regimen que se manifiestan en diferentes formas, entre otras, la abierta amenaza nuclear, los ejercicios belicos, la sancion y el bloqueo.
					
					Nuestro pais expresa el apoyo a las actividades del MNOAL por el desarme nuclear general y total y se esforzara ingentemente por alcanzar esta meta.

articles.title: Publicado comunicado del comite preparatorio norteno
articles.content:
Publicado comunicado del comite preparatorio norteno
Pyongyang, 7 de abril (ACNC) -- El Comite Preparatorio Norteno para la Conferencia Pannacional por la Paz y la Reunificacion de la Patria y el Desarrollo de las Relaciones Intercoreanas publico el dia 7 el siguiente comunicado:
					Ahora se dinamizan en el Sur de Corea y ultramar las actividades para la apertura de la conferencia pannacional a medida que se hacen mas fuertes el rechazo a las maniobras belicas y conflictivas de Estados Unidos y la banda de titeres surcoreanos contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la demanda sobre el mejoramiento de vinculos Norte-Sur.
					
					El 25 de marzo, la Direccion Surena de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria organizo el comite preparatorio para abrir sin falta la conferencia pannacional y expuso la decision de ponerse al frente en esta empresa.
					
					En Seul, Pusan y otros lugares del Sur de Corea se torna intensa la lucha de distintos sectores contra los ejercicios militares conjuntos de los imperialistas norteamericanos y los belicistas surcoreanos y por la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y la mejora de relaciones N-S. En tales circunstancias, toman auge en las provincias de Kyongsang del Sur y Kyonggi, la ciudad de Kwangju y otras regiones los preparativos para la fundacion del comite preparatorio regional para la conferencia pannacional.
					
					La Confederacion de Sindicatos Surcoreanos y la Federacion de Sindicatos Surcoreanos toman parte activa en la fundacion del comite preparatorio de la entidad obrera N-S para el mismo fin.
					
					Se suman a tales esfuerzos las entidades de los coreanos y las personalidades residentes en Japon, China, EE.UU. y otros paises.
					
					Mientras se hacen cada dia mas fuertes dentro y fuera del pais el entusiasmo y la voluntad de distintos estratos de lograr la paz y la reunificacion independiente, tendra lugar a mediados de abril en Shenyang de China la reunion del comite conjunto de trabajo del Norte, el Sur y ultramar para la conferencia pannacional.

articles.title: Sociedad norcoreana exige sepultar a Park Geun-hye y sus complices conservadores
articles.content:
Sociedad norcoreana exige sepultar a Park Geun-hye y sus complices conservadores
Pyongyang, 7 de abril (ACNC) -- Con motivo del saque a flote del casco del siniestrado ferry Sewol en el Sur de Corea, vuelve a tomar auge en el Sur de Corea la lucha de distintos estratos en demanda del esclarecimiento de verdaderos aspectos de esa tragedia y del castigo a culpables.
					Al respecto, el portavoz de la Sociedad de Medidas de Derechos Humanos en el Sur de Corea publico el dia 7 una declaracion que sigue:
					
					Esa lucha significa la explosion de rencor e indignacion acumulados de los habitantes surcoreanos por Park Geun-hye y sus compinches conservadores que si bien causaron el desastre del siglo con las politicas antipopulares sin precedentes en la historia, actuan descaradamente sin pedir disculpas ni arrepentirse.
					
					La muerte masiva de los sobrevivientes encerrados en el barco en hundimiento resulta evidentemente el asesinato cometido por la horda de Park Geun-hye.
					
					No se puede encubrir el sucio crimen de Park Geun-hye, mujerzuela de sangre fria, y la camarilla conservadora que causaron la calamidad y convirtieron todo el territorio surcoreano en el ferry Sewol en hundimiento.
					
					Aunque Park fue expulsada de Chongwadae por la sentencia de la historia y el pueblo y mandada a la prision, mantiene todavia su sucia vida rechinando los dientes para la venganza de sangre.
					
					Ademas los complices de ella estan desesperados para fabricar el segundo "poder" de Park Geun-hye enganando y burlandose de la opinion publica con artimanas de toda indole y el descaro.
					
					La expulsion de Park de Chonwadae y su encarcelamiento no pasan de ser el primer paso hacia nueva vida y nueva sociedad.
					
					Para la vida verdadera y la dignidad, los surcoreanos de distintos sectores deben esclarecer consecuentemente los verdaderos aspectos de la tragedia del ferry Sewol y castigar duro a los culpables.
					
					Asi deberan librar del rencor a cientos de ninos ahogados en las aguas frias del mar y enterrar a Park Geun-hye y su camarilla de asesinos.

articles.title: ACNC publica informacion por 5o aniversario de eleccion de Kim Jong Un a los puestos cimeros del partido y el Estado
articles.content:
ACNC publica informacion por 5o aniversario de eleccion de Kim Jong Un a los puestos cimeros del partido y el Estado
Pyongyang, 7 de abril (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 5o aniversario de la eleccion del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un a los cargos supremos del Partido y el Estado, la Agencia Central de Noticias de Corea publico el dia 7 una informacion. 
					Segun el documento, en la IV Conferencia del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el quinto periodo de sesiones de la XII Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, efectuados en abril del 101 (2012) de la Era Juche, el Maximo Dirigente ascendio al puesto cimero de la revolucion coreana por la voluntad general de todo el partido, ejercito y pueblo. Esto fue un gran acontecimiento politico y jubilo nacional que trajo cambio trascendental en el fortalecimiento del partido y en la construccion de una potencia socialista en el periodo importante para el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche. 
					
					Bajo la probada y veterana orientacion de el que posee la perspicacia ideo-teorica, la extraordinaria capacidad directiva y los nobles rasgos populares, el Partido, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea crearon milagros sin precedentes manteniendo como linea de vida los legados del Dirigente Kim Jong Il e impulsando el avance victorioso de la causa socialista bajo la bandera del Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo. 
					
					Gracias al evento mencionado, el PTC se ha fortalecido como organizacion politica de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, se han unido en torno al Partido todos los militares y civiles coreanos con la unica idea y alma y la Corea del Juche se ha convertido en la potencia nuclear y militar del Oriente que defiende la paz mundial. 
					
					Aun en medio de las peores adversidades causadas por la inaudita campana de aislamiento y aplastamiento de los imperialistas, se ha fortalecido incomparablemente el poderio estatal de la Corea socialista basado en el principio de autofortalecimiento y se abre la gran era de Mallima, nueva epoca de prosperidad nacional en que se realizan los suenos e ideales del pueblo acortando el tiempo. 
					
					Esta realidad maravillosa de la gloriosa era de Kim Jong Un comprueba claramente la verdad de que ninguna fuerza puede detener el avance victorioso de la Corea socialista que marcha por el camino indicado por el gran PTC y que la victoria final es de la RPDC. 
					
					Habra siempre victorias y glorias en el avance del ejercito y pueblo coreanos que marchan a galopes con el espiritu revolucionario del Paektu y el poderio de autofortalecimiento bajo la orientacion del Maximo Dirigente y sosteniendo en alto la bandera del gran Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo.
